mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') days,count( commodity_id) commodityCount ,count(id)as `count` from `order` where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= create_time group by days
SELECT * FROM `order` where DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= create_time and state = 1 and merchant_id =#{merchantId};

select c.name,o.create_time, CONCAT("进价",c.price,"元,售",o.price) as des1, CONCAT(1,'件利润(',o.price-c.price,'元)','销售额',o.price,"总优惠(",0,')') as des from `order` o left join commodity c on o.commodity_id = c.id where o.merchant_id =#{merchantId} and o.state = 1
and o.create_time < #{endTime} and o.create_time>#{startTime}

select count(id) as orderNum,sum(price) as orderPrice,(CASE WHEN payment_method = '1' THEN '支付宝' WHEN payment_method = '2' THEN '微信' end ) as paymentMethodStr from `order` where payment_method is not null and payment_method != 0 and state =1 and create_time >(DATE_SUB(curdate(),INTERVAL 0 DAY)) group by payment_method
